skins.selfIntroduction: Though I received many modifications during the war, I never was able to put any of it to good use... But, there aren't many ships in the Iron Blood with longer service histories than me? I, I can't even believe it myself...
skins.acquisition: I am the second ship of the Leipzig-class, Nürnberg. Starting today, I shall serve you to the best of my abilities... Is that acceptable?
skins.login: It is time to begin working. C-Commander, please give it your all...!
skins.details: Why are you here by yourself, Commander? ...W-were you perhaps waiting for everyone else to leave...?! Oh, you weren't?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, do you like br?tchen? I see... Th-then, if work goes well, I... I'll make some for you!
skins.secretaryIdle2: I wonder if there's anything that can be done about Leipzig always collapsing... Ph-physical exercises, you say? Commander, are you planning to do something weird to Leipzig?!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Am I being too hard on you? What should I do... If I was to make you upset with me... W-well, I'm sure it's fine, since you're probably thinking up all kinds of weird things right now...!
skins.secretaryTouch: Are... are you trying to condition me to be less cautious by touching me...?!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Aaah?! Wh-what are you doing all of a sudden, Commander?!
skins.secretaryHeadpat: Eek?! Suddenly touching my head like that... Commander, you're thinking of doing something weird, aren't you...?! Am, am I wrong?

skins.shipDescription: Since you so readily accepted my invitation to go on a vacation together, you must be planning to... Ahh, what I meant is, we can leave at any time if you're ready...!
skins.acquisition: Since you so readily accepted my invitation to go on a vacation together, you must be planning to... Ahh, what I meant is, we can leave at any time if you're ready...!
skins.login: Commander, let's head out if you've already finished getting ready? There are lots of places I'd like to go today.
skins.details: Hmm... Commander, can you come help me pick out a good souvenir for everyone back in the Iron Blood?
skins.secretaryIdle1: I wish Leipzig was here as well... Well, she's never been good with crowded places though...
skins.secretaryIdle2: I never knew the Sakura Empire's food was this delicious... Yeah, I'll have to ask my friends how to make these.
skins.secretaryIdle3: The Sakura Empire's traditional outfits are so beautiful... Eek?! Commander?! Where were you staring at just now?!
skins.secretaryTouch: Y-you want to hold my hand?! ...Are you sure it's just so we don't get separated...?
